promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic bird normal-type pokemon with regal feathers. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or bird. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regafeathra, a a massive basic bird normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Slow-Acting Poison, Shed Skin. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bird", "normal" or "Regafeathra". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, bird-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: In the fields, roams the massive Regafeathra, an avian being of splendor. Its feathered shafts carry a toxin that slowly weakens foes, allowing it to safely shed and renew its vibrant plumage.
